question: Bilhana and Vijnanesvara flourished in the court of which of the following Later Chalukyan rulers?
explanation: The two great writers of the time, named Bilhana and Vijnanesvara, flourished at the court of Vikramaditya VI. The younger brother of Vikramaditya IV, Jayasimha, whom he had appointed as a Viceroy at Banavasi, revolted in 1083 A.D.
